alert.note: Alert for Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:29PM MDT until May 12 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Woodbury County in west central Iowa... Southwestern Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... Dakota County in northeastern Nebraska... Eastern Dixon County in northeastern Nebraska... Southern Union County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Emerson, or 20 miles south of Ponca, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Homer around 635 PM CDT. Allen and Hubbard around 640 PM CDT. Dakota City and Jackson In Dakota County around 645 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Sioux City, South Sioux City, Martinsburg, Ponca, North Sioux City, Jefferson, Ponca State Park, Elk Point and Hinton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
